page.title: 02Home life
page.content: My home is a large detached house with five bedrooms.I don't have any pets because my rabbit escaped. When I come from school I bring my friend Catherine with me.When I come in I have something to eat.My brother,who is fourteen,comes in at 4:00,and he brings in my other brother who is four years old,and looked after by a person called Mrs Ingle. When Catherine and I have changed we call for Lisa Dow our friend,and have a game of tennis.Catherine's Dad comes for her at 5:30. My Mum and Dad come in from work at 6:00,and we have dinner.After that I take a tape recorder over to the field and have a game of football with my older brother.I get home at around 8:00 and then I watch television,my younger brother is in bed by then.At 9:30 I go to bed and read.
